Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
Represents a flight in the flight booking system.

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, double basePrice)
      Constructor with capacity and base price.
      Parameters:
      id - flight id
      flightNumber - flight number
      origin - origin
      destination - destination
      departureDate - departure date
      capacity - total seats available
      basePrice - base price for booking

    • addPassenger

      public void addPassenger(Customer passenger) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a passenger to this flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the customer to add
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if passenger already exists on this flight

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(Customer passenger) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Removes a passenger from this flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the customer to remove
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if passenger is not on this flight
